column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
With increased budget, I have introduced following redudency to improve performance
Storage amount increased to 10000 GB, an replaced Quantity (2) of Amazon RDS for MySQL Instance type (db.m4.4xlarge) with instance type (db.m4.10xlarge)
Number of EC2 instances to run webservers and application servers increased from 16 to 32
